title: (x) "Prepare For Combat" Nike Football square sans - similar to Stratum 2 {Mike Y}
content:
probably stencil variation is custom solution from the nike's designer.  
It is really close to "Klavika" but it is not. What is it?  
Do you know this font (from nike football),

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415062605im_/http:/typophile.com/files/w74_1600_5410.jpg)
author: antrepo

comments.content:
I think if you slanted and 'stencilized' [Stratum 2](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415062605/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/processtype/stratum2/) Black, you would have it.

- Mike Yanega
you may right, but stratum more condensed... I have it and i checked.

If we are allowing other graphic tweaking, then widening should also be OK.

- Mike Yanega
Indeed, it most probably is custom designed or customised, so...
